thread.title: Concurrent Releases Unified Content Delivery Solution 3.0
thread.title_full: Concurrent Releases Unified Content Delivery Solution 3.0

title: Concurrent Releases Unified Content Delivery Solution 3.0
text: Concurrent Releases Unified Content Delivery Solution 3.0   Published on 2015-09-11 01:17:48 Concurrent Releases Unified Content Delivery Solution 3.0 -- ATLANTA, Sept. 11,   Concurrent, a global leader in innovative solutions, enables seamless delivery, management and monetization of video on any screen. Concurrent's screen-independent video delivery and media data solutions create a 360-degree view of the ... × <- stripped tags -> Concurrent, a global leader in innovative solutions, enables seamless delivery, management and monetization of video on any screen. Concurrent's screen-independent video delivery and media data solutions create a 360-degree view of the consumer video experience and provides cable, telco, wireless, web, advertising and content development industries with new revenue opportunities. Concurrent, Concurrent Computer Corporation and its logo are registered trademarks of Concurrent Computer Corporation.  ><- stripped tags -> ATLANTA , Sept. 11,   [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQTZMeTlqWTNWeUxtTnZiUzlvYjIxbFhDSWdjbVZzUFZ3aWJtOW1iMnhzYjNkY0lpQjBZWEpuWlhROVhDSmZZbXhoYm10Y0lqNURiMjVqZFhKeVpXNTBQQzloUGc9PXw=]] (NASDAQ: [[]]), a global provider of high-performance Linux ® and storage solutions, today announced a new major release of its Unified Content Delivery Solution that includes enhanced support for Cloud DVR and 4K streaming services. System release version 3.0 offers performance and feature enhancements, as well as pre-certified integrations with an extended range of ecosystem partners in support of next generation IP, over-the-top (OTT) and set-top box services. "We are excited to announce the 3.0 release of our Unified Content Delivery Solution," said Matt Smith , Vice President of Product Line Management for Concurrent. "Our latest software enables customers to launch new services more quickly to address an increasingly fragmented device landscape. By combining support for many video formats, streaming protocols, and consumer applications into one powerful content delivery network solution, we are making it easier for our customers to offer a richer, more connected, multi-screen experience for their subscribers." Highlighted features of Concurrent's Unified Content Delivery Solution, version 3.0 include: 4K Streaming: Deliver 4K video streams to set-top boxes and connected devices Cloud DVR: Enable consumers to record content in the cloud and watch it on any device Advanced Storage: Scale-out storage capacity with integrated support for Ceph ® High-Density: Take advantage of the latest commercial server and storage hardware OTT Caching: Transparently cache popular Internet content using new profiles Rapid Deployment: Launch more quickly with extended support for the leading back office, content management, and online video platforms Concurrent will be demonstrating its Unified Content Delivery Solution at IBC 2015 in Amsterdam on Sept 11-15 (Hall 2, Stand B31). Customers, partners, and other interested parties are invited to schedule meetings with Concurrent using the following link: [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQnpPaTh2ZDNkM0xtTmpkWEl1WTI5dEwybGlZeTB5TURFMUwxd2lJSEpsYkQxY0ltNXZabTlzYkc5M1hDSWdkR0Z5WjJWMFBWd2lYMkpzWVc1clhDSSthSFIwY0hNNkx5OTNkM2N1WTJOMWNpNWpiMjB2YVdKakxUSXdNVFV2UEM5aFBnPT18]]. About Concurrent Concurrent (NASDAQ: [[]]) is a global software and solutions company that develops advanced applications on a core foundation of high performance Linux ® and storage technologies. We serve industries and customers that demand uncompromising performance, reliability and flexibility to gain a competitive edge, drive meaningful growth and confidently deliver best-in-class solutions that enrich the lives of millions of people around the world every day. Offices are located in North America , Europe and Asia . Visit [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQTZMeTkzZDNjdVkyOXVZM1Z5Y21WdWRDNWpiMjB2WENJZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCMFlYSm5aWFE5WENKZllteGhibXRjSWo1M2QzY3VZMjl1WTNWeWNtVnVkQzVqYjIwOEwyRSt8]] for further information and follow us on Twitter: [[]].
